modName: Add Max Zed and Animal Options
modShortDescription: This adds options to the menu for Max Zombies and Max Animal Counts normally only configurable via serverconfig.xml.
modDescription:
This adds options to the [menu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-menu/) for Max Zombies and Max Animal Counts normally only configurable via serverconfig.xml.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_UIMENU_AddMaxZedAndAnimalOptions)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
